Add Files Button Tooltip: Drag with your mouse or hold Shift or Ctrl (Command) to select multiple files.
Additional Images Help: Upload additional images with this submission.
Comma Separate Tags: Please separate each tag with a comma (one, two, three)
Contact Message: Contact me on one of these sites:
Create Template Tooltip: Save current form to allow it to be reused in future submissions
Default Description Tooltip: This description will be used for all websites checked to use default
Default Tag Tooltip: Tags that will be sent to all websites unless overwritten
Donate Incentive: Donations incentivize me to continue to keep PostyBirb updated.
Donate Reason: PostyBirb has been provided free because I cannot guarantee optimal functionality at all times.
JournalBirb dashboard: Post a journal or status to one or more websites from one simple form
PostyBirb dashboard: Schedule or post multimedia submissions to multiple websites all at once from one simple form
Save Tooltip: Save submissions to the gallery for posting
Stop On Error: Submission did not post successfully. Would you like to stop?
Website Agreement: By using PostyBirb you agree to the Terms of Service and Rules of the websites that you are posting to. You are responsible for everything you post.
